item.title: Git as a secure private Maven repository
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: As my previous blogposts already covered how to set up a private Maven repository, you might wonder “Why again a Maven blogpost?”. Well that’s a fair question and the answer is twofold:
